### 2024 Election Results and the 2024 District Map
library(tidyverse)
df_test <- read_csv("data/cleaned_precincts.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
names(df_test)

df <- read_csv("data/cleaned_precincts.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  select(CDDIST, DEMVOTE, REPVOTE) |> 
  mutate(total = DEMVOTE + REPVOTE, dem_share = DEMVOTE / total)

mean_median_score <- mean(df$dem_share, na.rm = TRUE) - median(df$dem_share, na.rm = TRUE)
mean_median_score
